channel.title: Thoughts on Albert Azemars' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Albert Azemars' Blog

item.title: Francis Albert Sinatra, My Way and all that jazz
item.description: Francis Albert Sinatra or as commonly known as Frank Sinatra is, in my humble opinion, one of the best crooners that ever lived. His songs have healed my soul when I needed it the most, guided me while dealing with my feelings, and empowered me to make bold decisions in my life. Even though we never shared a time frame in our existence, I have to thank him for always being there for me.
